query: Can you provide me with the results of my anxiety assessment from July 7, 2020?
resource_summaries:
This record is about a completed procedure for the assessment of anxiety that took place at NEWTON-WELLESLEY UROLOGY, PC on July 7, 2020.
This record is an Observation of a Patient Health Questionnaire 2 item (PHQ-2) total score reported on July 7, 2020, with a score of 0.
answer: Based on your medical record, on July 7, 2020, you had an assessment of anxiety at NEWTON-WELLESLEY UROLOGY, PC. The assessment was completed and the PHQ-2 total score was 0.
